result.arabic_text: وَقِيلَ ٱدۡعُواْ شُرَكَآءَكُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ لَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَهۡتَدُونَ
result.translation: 64.Kaadu Qhiyaamah ayro korosuk Yallat agleh haak sugten agleytiitih seeca keenik iyyan, tokkel ken scccaanaah usun kecnil gacsaanam maloonuuy, digaalâ sinni intih yablen, usun diggah addunyal cakkil tirri iyye marah sugaanamal diggalsimak manannon.
